summary: This mod sets both the vampire and khajit Night Eye lesser powers to have an infinite duration and be toggle able.
descriptionHtml:
=== Night Eye toggle by Dam ===

This mod sets the following lesser powers to an infinite (0s) duration:
- Vampire Night Eye
- Khajit Night Eye
- Werewolf Night Eye

I've never seen the werewolf night eye in game butÂ it's in the game's files so I changed it as well.

I'm aware Hull released a similar mod (and a long while earlier too).
Sadly, his mod doesn't work for vampires, this one corrects this minor oversight.



Like this mod ?
Spread the joy by Endorsing it :)






Steps if you're not using NMM :

=== Installation ===

1/ Put nighteye_toggle.esp in Skyrim's \Data\ folder.
2/ Start Skyrim's launcher, click on Data Files and check the plugin.


=== Deactivation ===

1/ Start Skyrim's launcher, click on Data Files and uncheck the plugin.
You may re-enable it at a later time simply by checking it again.


=== Removal ===

Delete the nighteye_toggle.esp from Skyrim's \Data\ folder.
